knimeNode.name: RDKit One Component Reaction
knimeNode.shortDescription: Applies a reaction to an input SMILES or molecule column

fullDescription.intro:
Applies a reaction to an input SMILES or molecule column.
The output table contains a row for each product produced by applying the reaction to the inputs.
Each row contains the product molecule, index information, and the reactant molecule that was used.
fullDescription.option: The column containing reactant molecules as either SMILES or RDKit Molecules

A reaction SMARTS describing the reaction.
For a description of the format, please see Chapter 2 of the RDKit Book: http://rdkit.svn.sourceforge.net/viewvc/rdkit/trunk/Docs/Book/RDKit_Book.pdf

ports.inPort: Data with SMILES or RDKit Molecule column
